subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: On a night in which Yankees Manager Joe Girardi called a players meeting, the team’s struggling offense did what it had to do to help Mike Mussina to a win in the fifth start in a row.
snippet: On a night in which Yankees Manager Joe Girardi called a players meeting, the team’s struggling offense did what it had to do to help Mike Mussina to a win in the fifth start in a row.
